entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
